--- alter_index_drop_stored_column.sql
alter index foo drop stored column bar

--- AST
&ast.AlterIndex{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 12,
    NameEnd: 15,
    Name:    "foo",
  },
  IndexAlteration: &ast.DropStoredColumn{
    Drop: 16,
    Name: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 35,
      NameEnd: 38,
      Name:    "bar",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER INDEX foo DROP STORED COLUMN bar
